text:
This pose... doing it for a long time
is tough.

Sorry, Asahi-chan.
I just took so many pictures of you because you're so set.

Looks good!
I'll take that one too!

Good job, Asahi.
You worked hard.

Producer-san said
that the photo we take today is crucial for the live.

Ah! Right, the visuals we took today
will be used for various announcements.

It helps build excitement for the live──
In that sense, it's very important.
Does it... make you look forward to it?
